comparison_sdg: The time series is compliant with the UN metadata.
indicator_name: Completion rate (primary education, lower secondary education, upper secondary education)
target_name: By 2030, ensure that all girls and boys complete free, equitable and quality primary and secondary education leading to relevant and effective learning outcomes
un_designated_tier_url_alert: der Statistischen Division der Vereinten Nationen
goal_meta_link_alert: the Statistical Devision of the UN
data_footnotes:
ISCED: International Standard Classification of Education
• All persons who have at least one qualification from the ISCED levels are recorded.
• At primary level (ISCED 1), no formal qualification is acquired with promotion to the 5th grade. A measurement by participation in lower secondary education is not practical due to the compulsory school attendance in Germany.
• Due to methodological changes, the results from 2020 onwards are only comparable with previous years to a limited extend.
goal_meta_national_link_text: Metadata on the presented time series
